revisionDesc.change: General - Lin22: (ⲁ̣ⲫⲱ( )) must stand for ἀφʼ (ὧ(ν). I will enter it as a PN correction later.
Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/sb;1;5953' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.ryl.copt;;338'

Vote - AcceptText - lins7 & 9 λιβε => λίβε(ρνον) || lin9 <#δ=4#>[.1] => <#μ[.1]=40-49#> (we don’t know if a letter was lost in the break, hence 40, not 41) || lin11 (ἀ̣γ̣[ά]θ̣(ῳ)) => (ἀ̣γ̣[α]θ̣(ῷ)) | <:θεοφυλάκτῳ=grc|reg|θεοφυ\|ε|/λο\|υ|/:>: ε and υ are superscript, but ε is most probably a cross and υ something else. || lin21 => νο(μίσματα)) <#γ=3#> (κεράτια) .1<#γ̣=3#> <#𐅵=1/2#> (the number of the carats would have been 13 or 23, a complicated number tag) || lin22 use symbol (𐅵) for (ἥμισυ) || lin26 => νο(μίσματα)) <#γ=3#> (κεράτια) ε

Vote - AcceptText - NB. Lines 21 and 26 with the figures and the abbreviations have to be checked. = P.Ryl.Copt. 338 lin1=> space after ⲥⲟⲩ; better (ⲁⲑ(ⲩⲣ)) ?; lin3=> correct twice [.] to .1; lin4=>\ⲉ̣ϩⲏⲧ/; ⲕⲁⲧⲟ <#ⲥⲛⲧⲉ=2#> ; lin6=> ⲉϫⲛ <:ⲡ<:ὑποπόδιον=grc|reg|ϩⲩⲡⲟⲡⲟⲇⲓⲟⲛ:>|reg|ⲫⲩⲡⲟⲡⲟⲇⲓⲟⲛ:> ⲛⲧⲉⲧⲛⲉ<:; correct [.4] to .4 ; better (ⲁⲑ(ⲩⲣ)) ?; lin12=> ⲛ<:ⲧ<:ὑπόστασις=grc|reg|ϩⲩⲡⲟⲥⲧⲁⲥⲓⲥ:>|reg|ⲑ̣ⲩⲡⲟⲥⲧⲁⲥⲓⲥ:> ; lin14=> space after ⲯⲟⲓ ; lin15=> ϩⲁ ⲡⲙⲁ ⲛⲡ<:ἅγιος=grc|reg|ϩⲁⲅ̣ⲓ̣ⲟⲥ:> : lin16=> correct [.2] to .2 ; lin17=> correct ϩⲣⲓⲡⲁ[.2] to ϩⲣⲓⲡⲁⲣ.2 ; lin18=> correct [.4] to .4 ; lin20=> correct [.2] et [.] to .2 and .1 ; ⲣⲟ\ⲩ/ ; lin21=> why not (νο(μίσματα)) ?; correct [.] to .1 ; lin22=> ⲁⲫ ⲱ is likely to be Greek and the ⲱ not an omega but a symbol ; correct [.] to .1 ; ~|<#α=1#> <#((ἥμισυ))=1/2#> .4 <#α=1#> <#=2/3#>|~grc ; lin24=> ⲛ̣<:ⲛⲉϩ|reg|ⲛϩ:> ; lin25 ϩⲁ ⲡ<:οἶνος=grc|reg|ⲟⲓ(ⲛⲟⲩ):> ; correct to ⲕⲛⲓⲇ(ⲓⲟⲛ) ; the Greek sentence begins only on lin26 !!; lin26=> why not (νο(μίσματα)) ?; the figures are to be reviewed.
Coptic text added, some Greek abb. resolved (?),text needs reediting
Submit - Coptic text added, some Greek abb. resolved (?),text needs reediting
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
